Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is due to the incorrect use of logical operators in the second condition. The condition should be (n <= 1 || n >= 10) && outsideMode, but it is written as n <= 1 || (n >= 10 && outsideMode). This means that when outsideMode is false and n is less than or equal to 1, the function will return true, which is incorrect. Test case 16 should fail the buggy code as it tests this specific scenario. No changes were made to the test cases as they already satisfy the required conditions.
